_header: O mors mordens aspere in guile thou hast no peer
_description: An apostrophe to Death — four long macaronic lines

CamTCC1450.Transcription:
O mors mordens aspere yn gyle þu haste noo peereNam
                        sanes in prospere Thow bryngyst to the bere& tua sentencia
                    ffallyt bothe yonge and oolde& fallax potencia Thow makyst
                    all vnboolde
CamTCC1450.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 248.
